tool.name: repeatmasker

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Specify the species or clade of the input sequence.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Masks only those repeats < x percent diverged from consensus seq.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Use matrices calculated for given number percentage background GC level.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Maximum sequence length masked without fragmenting (default 40000, 300000 for DeCypher).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Maximum length for which IS- or repeat clipped sequences can be produced (default 4000000). Memory requirements go up with higher maxsize.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Does not mask low_complexity DNA or simple repeats.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Only masks low complex/simple repeats (no interspersed repeats).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Does not mask small RNA (pseudo) genes.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Only masks Alus (and 7SLRNA, SVA and LTR5)(only for primate DNA).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Only clips E coli insertion elements out of fasta and .qual files.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Clips IS elements before analysis (default: IS only reported).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Skips bacterial insertion element check.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Only checks for rodent specific repeats (no repeatmasker run).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Only checks for primate specific repeats (no repeatmasker run).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Skips the steps in which repeats are excised.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Alignments are presented in the orientation of the repeat (with option -a).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Sets cutoff score for masking repeats when using -lib (default 225).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Returns complete .masked sequence in lower case.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Returns repetitive regions in lowercase (rest capitals) rather masked.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Returns repetitive regions masked with Xs rather than Ns.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Reports simple repeats that may be polymorphic (in file.poly).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Creates an additional Gene Feature Finding format output.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Creates an additional annotation file not processed by ProcessRepeats.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Creates an additional output file in cross_match format (for parsing).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Creates an (old style) annotation file with fixed width columns.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Leaves out final column with unique ID for each element.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Calculates repeat densities (in .tbl) excluding runs of >=20 N/Xs in the query.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Use an alternate search engine to the default.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
parameter_list.helptext: The input fasta sequence files.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: The output directory. Do not change this.

tool.description: RepeatMasker is a program that screens DNA sequences for interspersed repeats and low complexity DNA sequences.
